title: Hugging Face Spaces vs Hugging Face Transformers: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?

introduction: Choosing between Hugging Face Spaces and Hugging Face Transformers? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Hugging Face Spaces vs Hugging Face Transformers
paragraphs: Hugging Face Spaces (ml frameworks) is Platform for hosting machine learning demos and applications with support for Gradio, Streamlit, and other frameworks.. It's known for Demo Hosting, Community, Multiple Frameworks.
Hugging Face Transformers (nlp) is Open-source library providing thousands of pre-trained transformer models for NLP and vision tasks.. Users choose it for AI, NLP, Transformers.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Hugging Face Spaces: Demo hosting, Multiple frameworks, Community sharing
Hugging Face Transformers: Pre-trained models, Text classification, Question answering

verdict: Both Hugging Face Spaces and Hugging Face Transformers are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Hugging Face Spaces for Demo Hosting, Hugging Face Transformers for AI.
